server {{
    listen 80;
    server_name {domains};

    location = /favicon.ico {{ access_log off; log_not_found off; }}

    location {static} {{
        root {path};
    }}

    location {media} {{
        root {path};
    }}

    location / {{
        include proxy_params;
        proxy_pass http://unix:{sock};
    }}

    {extras}
}}
